description: Dragon Ball Z follows the adventures of Goku who, along with the Z Warriors, defends the Earth against evil.
Blue Lock is a Japanese manga series written by Muneyuki Kaneshiro and illustrated by Yusuke Nomura.
A high-school student discovers a supernatural notebook that grants its user the ability to kill.
Naruto Uzumaki, is a loud, hyperactive, adolescent ninja who constantly searches for approval and recognition on his journey to becoming Hokage in his village.
When man-eating Titans first appeared 100 years ago, humans found safety behind massive walls that stopped the giants in their tracks.
Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Koyoharu Gotouge.
